title: Nursing Note Entry and Display UI
description:
Create Nursing Notes Management System with Rich Text Editor and History View

Build a comprehensive nursing notes feature that allows healthcare staff to create, edit, and review patient nursing notes with formatting capabilities.

Requirements:

Form Component:
- Implement rich text editor supporting common formatting (bold, italic, underline, lists, headings)
- Include required metadata fields (patient ID, timestamp, nurse name/ID, note type/category)
- Add auto-save functionality to prevent data loss
- Validate required fields before submission
- Provide character count and word count indicators
- Support mentions/tags for other staff members if applicable

History/Display View:
- Show chronological list of all nursing notes for a patient
- Display note metadata (author, timestamp, last modified date)
- Render formatted content with proper styling
- Implement filtering options (date range, note type, author)
- Add search functionality within note content
- Support pagination or infinite scroll for large note histories
- Provide print/export capabilities for documentation

Technical Considerations:
- Choose appropriate rich text editor library (e.g., Quill, TipTap, Draft.js)
- Implement proper sanitization of HTML content to prevent XSS attacks
- Ensure HIPAA compliance for storing and transmitting patient data
- Design responsive layout for both desktop and tablet use
- Add loading states and error handling for API calls
- Consider edit/delete permissions and audit trail requirements
